sentences.english: Test, tweak, rinse and repeat until you succeed.
sentences.chinese: 在你成功之前，测试，调节，清理和重做。

sentences.english: In turn, a thin drunk sleep the chill heavy.

sentences.english: No one could account for the fact that one of the boxes was extremely heavy.
sentences.chinese: 此中有只箱子特别重，可谁也弄不清是怎么回事。

sentences.english: Conclusion Heavy-moxibustion is a good method for constipation after stroke.

sentences.english: Loop quantum gravity is in the jargon background independent.

sentences.english: The prisoner had on his feet fetters weighing fifty pounds.
sentences.chinese: 这犯人的脚上有一对五十斤重的铁球。

sentences.english: The pain had become constant in the last two months and was associated with diarrhea and tenesmus.
sentences.chinese: 近二个月有持续疼痛的情形，且合并腹泻及裹急后重。

sentences.english: This elephant is five times weightier than that small tiger.
sentences.chinese: 这头大象比那只小老虎重五倍。

sentences.english: The heavy rare earth and Y also belong to immobile elements.
sentences.chinese: 重稀土元素及Y也属于不活泼元素。
